also i suspect that it might not work if one installed dlc before disabling in game online options as well as banning the exe file from going to the internet in windows firewall (or any other fireware you are running). if that's the case, i think you might have to uninstall the game and clean up the registry and user data associated with this game, before trying again.
lordvr, if you are using vista/win7, be sure to give the crack admin rights (run as admin or something).

3. Use MassEffect2.EXE from "Binaries" to start game. done.
